svg.text: Google ADK + AG-UI/A2UI + MCP + A2A Protocol + Auth0 + OpenBao + Multi-Tenant
Enterprise-Grade Multi-User Cloud Cost Optimization Platform

g.text: ‚Ä¢ Per-tenant cloud credentials (AWS keys, Azure SPs, GCP SAs)
‚Ä¢ Transit encryption for sensitive data ‚Ä¢ Audit logging
Intent Classification ‚Ä¢ Multi-Agent Routing ‚Ä¢ Context Management ‚Ä¢ A2UI Rendering
LLM: Gemini 2.0 Flash / Claude ‚Ä¢ Tenant Context Injection ‚Ä¢ Permission Enforcement
Every query scoped to tenant's cloud accounts and permissions
MCP Gateway / Router (Port 8081) ‚Ä¢ Credential Injection from OpenBao per Tenant
CLOUD PROVIDER LAYER (Per-Tenant Credentials via OpenBao)
‚Ä¢ Tenant context in every agent call
‚Ä¢ Full org access, user mgmt, policies
6. Scoped cloud API calls with tenant creds
All queries scoped to tenant's accounts only
DEVELOPMENT TIMELINE: 8-10 months (extended for multi-tenant + A2A)

svg.text: Multi-Cloud FinOps Agent v2.0 Architecture ‚Ä¢ Auth0 + A2A + OpenBao + Multi-Tenant ‚Ä¢ January 2026
